topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546ed1db6368722a13610000#post_546ed1db6368722a13610000
Imagine Megatron not only as a villain, but a full-fledged character.
He has likes, dislikes, strengths, weaknesses, and every thing a good character should have. He's cunning, shrewd, manipulative, and very powerful. To him nothing is more important than his ambition. Perfect example. Spoiler for Transformers Prime ahead.
[spoiler]Megatron got his claws on an ancient Cybertronian tool, The Forge of Solus Prime. It can turn any raw material into a weapon of mass destruction. Unfortunately it can only be used by a Prime. So what does Megatron do? He Space Bridges to Cybertron, ransacks a Mausoleum built for dead Primes, TAKES ON OF THE DEAD PRIMES ARMS, and the grafts it onto his body. All so he can further his goals of conquest.[/spoiler]
